name: Frenzy Bubble Shooter
description:
Match 3 balls to crush, clear the screen, complete tasks and win coins and cool rewards
Tap the screen and drag the laser sight to finish shooting.

Features:
- Upgrade the gameplay, the map is even better!
- Stunning 3D special effects, powerful blasting props!
- More than 500 levels to challenge, endless territory exploration!
- The game is free of charge! All people are happy to participate!

What are you waiting for? Be prepared and start blasting. Experience this fun casual shooting game and explore thousands of amazing puzzles and surprises.
